goal: Anticipate the impact of floods on people
Avoid losses of lives and other risks for health and safety risks from flooding

goal: Mitigate health and safety risks from flooding

goal: Generate alerts recommending evacuation of residents in case of flood risk

goal: Issue alerts to ensure that all residents receive timely evacuation notifications
Distribute alerts across multiple channels, including emergency radio broadcasts, sirens, television announcements, and a dedicated smartphone app.

goal: Deploy sensors to measure water quality

goal: Implement flood mitigation infrastructure, such as stormwater basins, floodwalls, floodways, and dams
